home.title: Ark Nova Solo Helper
home.play1: Play the A.R.N.O. 3.0 Solo Mode (unofficial) of Ark Nova. Unlike the official solo mode, this simulates additional opponent(s) similar to a multi-player game.
home.play2: To play the solo mode you only need the base game. This helper application replaces the ARNO card deck and the dice and tracks ARNO's progression.

difficultyLevel.title: Difficulty Level
difficultyLevel.level7plus: Level 7+: If you want to play harder, add one conservation point for ARNO at the start of the game for each additional level.

expansions.title: Expansions
expansions.arno-conservation-project-module: ARNO: Variable Conservation Project condition determination
expansions.marineWorldsNewActionCards: Take 3 of the new Action cards at random and choose 2 of those (with different action types).

setupARNO.title: ARNO Setup
setupARNO.setupPlayerCount: Set up the game according to player count, including ARNO(s). A human player will be the starting player.
setupARNO.startPoints: Every ARNO starts with -{count} conservation points and appeal points according to the player order.
setupARNO.startPointsConservation: Place {count} player tokens as a reminder next to ARNO’s conservation points counter and remove them one by one as soon as ARNO scored his first conservation points.
setupARNO.startPointsAppeal: E.g. if ARNO is the 3rd player, he starts with 2 appeal points.
setupARNO.startComponents: Every ARNO receives the components of one color, a zoo mat (map A), one face-down Final Scoring card and 8 random Zoo cards.
setupARNO.startComponentsKeepCards: ARNO only keeps up to the first 2 Conservation Project cards. All Sponsor and Animal cards are discarded.
setupARNO.discardedSponsorCards: Please specify the number of sponsor cards discarded during setup:
setupARNO.playerTokens: Place all player tokens of ARNO’s color next to his zoo mat.
setupARNO.associationWorker: ARNO starts with one association worker on his notepad. Place the remaining 3 on the designated spaces below the notepad on his zoo mat.
setupARNO.finalScoringCard: Place the Final Scoring card on the left area of the zoo mat. This will cover the building area which is not needed for ARNO.
setupARNO.noDiceActionCards: You do not need dice or action cards.

upgradeCard.title: Upgrade Card
upgradeCard.text: Upgrade an action card from ARNO?
upgradeCard.note: Please note: Once ARNO reaches 2 conservation points, he always chooses to take an additional association worker, not a card upgrade.
upgradeCard.noteAppeal15BonusTile: ARNO chooses the bonus tile if he reaches more than 15 reputation (if still available).

revertUpgradeCard.title: Revert Upgrade Card
revertUpgradeCard.text: You can revert an upgraded card in case you accidentally upgraded it.

actionHelpAssociationWorker.title: Place Worker
actionHelpAssociationWorker.text: If ARNO already has one of his workers on this association task, he selects the next higher task where none of his workers is placed yet. Basically he is using X-markers to enhance the action; he never places two workers on the same action. If no higher task is available, he selects the next available lower task.
actionHelpAssociationWorker.text-fallback: If ARNO has no available worker anymore, he receives conservation points +2 and advances the Break token +2. Additionally he receives a new partner zoo or university. He prefers the kind he is missing the most.

pickConservationProject.conservationProjectsHand: How many Conservation Project cards has ARNO on his zoo mat?
pickConservationProject.conservationProjectsBoardNoToken: How many Conservation Project cards are available next to the Association board without any player tokens? (Ignore blocker tokens from the unused color.)
pickConservationProject.conservationProjectsBoardAvailable: How many Conservation Project cards are available next to the Association board which ARNO did not support yet?
pickConservationProject.pickFromHand: ARNO supports the {number}. Conservation Project card from his zoo mat.
pickConservationProject.pickFromBoardNoToken: ARNO supports the {number}. Conservation Project next to the Association board without any player token.
pickConservationProject.pickFromBoardAvailable: ARNO supports the {number}. Conservation Project next to the Association board which is available for him.
pickConservationProject.projectSlotLeftMost: ARNO prefers to place his token on the leftmost slot.
pickConservationProject.projectSlotMiddle: ARNO prefers to place his token on the middle slot.
pickConservationProject.projectSlotRightMost: ARNO prefers to place his token on the rightmost slot.
pickConservationProject.projectSlotAlternatives: If this slot is already covered by another player, he places it on the next level to the left. If that’s not possible as well, on the next available level to the right.

projectModule.tokenPlacement: ARNO places a token on this slot (in preferred order):
projectModule.gainConservationPoints: ARNO gains the conservation points and other bonuses from this slot: {slot}. If this slot is already covered by another player, he gains the points from the next level to the left. If that’s not possible as well, from the next available level to the right.

aboutARNO.title: A.R.N.O. Rules Summary
aboutARNO.noMoney: ARNO doesn‘t use money. He doesn‘t spend money for actions, and never receives money (for example during breaks or from Animal cards).
aboutARNO.rightArea: ARNO only uses the right area of his zoo mat. This is where he places his partner zoos and universities and where he takes his association workers from. He also receives the bonuses once he uncovers them. The left area of his zoo plan will not be considered and only be used to place his Zoo cards and Final Scoring card.
aboutARNO.bonuses: ARNO receives the following bonuses from his zoo plan and the general boards: Conservation points, card upgrades, reputation points and association workers. Besides money he also doesn’t receive any bonuses from Animal or Sponsor cards, buildings, enclosures, X-markers or during breaks.
aboutARNO.referenceValues: The Animal cards that are stacked on ARNO’s zoo mat provide reference values for certain card effects of the human players. Whenever ARNO places another Animal card on his stack, its icons will trigger the card effects of the other player(s).
aboutARNO.noEffectTarget: ARNO can never be the target of an interactive effect. Please use the alternative solo play effects of those cards instead.
aboutARNO.receiveCards: Every time ARNO receives cards during the game, discard all sponsor cards and stack animal and conservation project cards on his zoo mat.
aboutARNO.projectModuleInfo: For the optional conservation project module it's important to track all sponsor cards that are discarded at any time. For this, you have to specify the number of sponsor cards the ARNO discards during break (in the corresponding dialog), or if he snaps a card.

breakInfo.drawThreeCards: During the breaks, ARNO draws three cards from the deck. He keeps the first Conservation Project card and plays the first Animal Card to his zoo mat.
breakInfo.triggerBonus: The played Animal card might trigger a bonus effect for the human player(s). The other cards are discarded.
breakInfo.discardedSponsorCards: Please specify the number of sponsor cards discarded during break:

bonusTile.text: ARNO never picks the pre-printed bonus.
bonusTile.left: ARNO takes the left bonus tile from the display.
bonusTile.right: ARNO takes the right bonus tile from the display.
bonusTile.usage: ARNO can only use these three bonus tiles. He does not receive any bonus from the others.

scoring.title: Scoring
scoring.humanPlayersText: Get conservation points or appeal from Final Scoring card(s) and from all cards with end-of-game icon.
scoring.botText: Get {conservationPoints} conservation point(s) for {tokenScoringCardCount} token(s) on the final scoring card and {tokenNotepadCount} token(s) on the notepad.
scoring.appealReputationTrack: The app counts the appeal ARNO receives from playing the cards. It cannot track appeal that ARNO receives instead of reputation on step 15 of the reputation track.
